titleStmt.title: Whereas by two several proclamation, the one bearing date the 27th of October in the year 1673, and the other bearing date the 27th day of April in the year 1674 ... all titular popish archbishops, bishops, vicars-general, abbots and all others exercising ecclesiastical jurisdiction by any authority derived from the pope or see of Rome ... / by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
"Given at the Council Chamber in Dublin, the 16th. day of October, 1678."
Reproduction of original in Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
